text: Tumne dekha nahin un logon ko jinhon ne munafiqat (hypocrisy) ki rawish ikhtiyar ki hai? Yeh apne kafir ehle kitaab bhaiyon se kehte hain "agar tumhein nikala gaya to hum tumhare saath niklenge, aur tumhare maamle mein hum kisi ki baat hargiz na manenge, aur agar tumse jung ki gayi to hum tumhari madad karenge" magar Allah gawah hai ke yeh log qataii jhootey hain
